attributes.action: Horse Warning Signs For Abertridwr & Senghenydd
attributes.additional_details: A petition to try and get Horse Warning signs for the Abertridwr & Senghenydd area to make drivers more aware of horses being on the roads while travelling to hacking / schooling facility's in the area.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority (and, to the extent that it is a matter for central government, it is for the Assembly rather than the Westminster Parliament).
